public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This is the base class for action records.

Method Detail

copy

public Action copy()
Creates a deep copy of this action record. Useful if you want to clone a part of a SWF document.

Returns:
a copy of the action record

getCode

public short getCode()
Returns the code of the action record.

Returns:
the code

getLabel

public java.lang.String getLabel()
Returns this action record's label, which is used for jumps within an action block.

Returns:
the action's label

getOffset

public int getOffset()
Returns this action record's offset within the action block this action record is contained in (in bytes).

Returns:
the offset in bytes from the beginning of the containing action block

getSize

public int getSize()

Returns the size of this action record in bytes. Can be used to compute the size of an action block (e.g. for implementing jumps, function definitions etc.).

The size of action records with code <= 0x80 is always 1 byte (the action code). Other actions may contain data. Their size is of at least 3 bytes (1 byte action code, 2 bytes data length).

Returns:
size of action record (in bytes)

setLabel

public void setLabel(java.lang.String label)
Sets the label of this action record. The label is used for jumps within an action block. Warning: use a label only once within an action block!

Parameters:
label - label string, unique within an action block
